DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate pharmacokinetics and safety after oral administration of Irbesartan and Atorvastatin in combination as HCP0912
DOC.brief_title: A Bioequivalence Study Comparing Irbesartan/Atorvastatin Combination Tablet With Coadministration of Irbesartan and Atorvastatin
DOC.criteria: Age between 20 and 45 Signed informed consent form weight : over 45kg and in the range of Â±20% of IBW Has a medical history of hypersensitivity to atorvastatin or irbesartan severe Hypotension Not eligible for subject in health examination within 28 days of IP administration
